mapper.select: select no, category_name, description, date_format(reg_date,'%Y/%m/%d') as reg_date from category where blog_id = #{blog_id }

select category.no as no count(post.no) as count, category.category_name as name, category.description as description, from category left join post on category.no = post.category_no where category.blog_id = #{blog_id} group by category.no;
select no, category_name from category where blog_id = #{blog_id }
select no, blog_id, category_name, description from category where no = #{no}
